en-US.name: Independence Day Machine
en-US.summary: Adds an Independence Day themed machine to the list of games you can play
en-US.description: Crack out the fireworks with a special Independence Day machine with special symbols and sound effects!
examplePhrases: Alexa, buy the independence day machine
Alexa, give me the independence day machine
Alexa, give me the fourth of july machine

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: This will add the Independence Day Machine to the list of slot machine you can play.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congraultations! You can now access the Independence Day Machine by saying select a new machine.

testingInstructions: After purchasing, the Independnce Day Machine will show up in the list of games you can play when you say Select a new machine
